Articles.Content:
For those that don't want to dock, it wouldn't require docking port on object you want to catch. Mechanic could work just like asteroid-grabbing-part works, but without need of being super precise.

 



Also we could have super small asteroids around some bodies and delivering this asteroid to KCS would give us bonus science points. Asteroid would have to be delivered in cargo/service bay or else it would melt/explode during re-entry.

Edited November 28, 2018 by Cassel
